meanings.definition: Coming after or as a result of.
meanings.sent1: The following day was sunny and warm.
meanings.sent2: The following chapters in the book were full of suspense.
meanings.sent3: The following recipe for chocolate cake was a disaster.
meanings.sent4: The following footsteps in the snow led to a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The following movie ending left everyone in tears.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things that follow or attend an event or person.
meanings.sent1: The following of fans cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The following of ducks waddled behind the mother duck.
meanings.sent3: The following of balloons at the parade made a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: The following of stars in the sky twinkled brightly at night.
meanings.sent5: The following of ants marched in a straight line towards the food.

meanings.definition: The action of tracking or monitoring someone or something on social media.
meanings.sent1: Her following on social media grew rapidly after the viral video.
meanings.sent2: The following of comments on the post was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The following of likes on her photo made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The following of notifications on his phone never seemed to end.
meanings.sent5: The following of shares on the article spread the news quickly.
